name: Naomi Zhang
learned: I am a famous environmental activist known for my work in promoting sustainable living and conservation efforts. I enjoy hiking and organizing community clean-up events.
currently: I am planning a large-scale environmental awareness campaign in New York City.
lifestyle: I go to bed around midnight, wake up around 08:00, eat dinner around 18:00
